## Plan for Induction/Welcome Week full hack

-   The hack will be run as a full day event during the induction/welcome week.
-   Today is a seed event to get you thinking about the hack. A micro-hack if you will. The deliverables are all skeleton only, no specifics.
-   The key output is a 'seed file' that you can use to build on for the hack.
-   The seed file will be a markdown file with the following sections:
    -   Title
    -   Problem Space
    -   Description
    -   HackMaster volunteers
    -   Resources needed
